alert.note: Alert for Hamilton; Northern Herkimer (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albany (Eastern New York and Western New England)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 21 at 4:40PM EST until February 21 at 10:00PM EST by NWS Albany
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 PM EST THIS EVENING... ...WINTER STORM WATCH NOW IN EFFECT FROM WEDNESDAY AFTERNOON THROUGH THURSDAY EVENING... * WHAT...For the Winter Weather Advisory, snow. Additional snow accumulations of up to one inch. For the Winter Storm Watch, heavy snow and wintry mix precipitation including sleet and freezing rain possible. Total snow accumulations of 4 to 7 inches and ice accumulations of around one tenth of an inch possible. * WHERE...Northern Herkimer and Hamilton Counties. * WHEN...For the Winter Weather Advisory, until 10 PM EST this evening. For the Winter Storm Watch, from Wednesday afternoon through Thursday evening. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. The hazardous conditions could impact the Thursday morning commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snowfall rates Wednesday night may reach 1 inch per hour.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. Monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation.
